question:

  <mi>d</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">a{:}b = c{:}d</annotation></semantics></math>, then <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>b</mi>

  <mi>a</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>

  <mi>c</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">b{:}a = d{:}c</annotation></semantics></math> for all non-zero whole numbers <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>a</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">a</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>

  <mi>d</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">d</annotation></semantics></math>.
